locations.title: Raccoon River Park
locations.content: Raccoon River Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Took my daughter there to compete in here first USA Triathlon. The park is excellent. Clean with an open feeling, yet safe. The lakeside is beautiful. Peaceful. Clean bathroom facilities and covered areas by the picnic areas.

We spent the weekend at the raccoon River Park baseball fields, which were very nice, very clean, the staff was present on site. You saw them in the bathrooms and changing the trash. They did a great job. The concession stand had lots of options, including adult beverages.Overall a great place to spend the weekend playing baseball.

Absolutely beautiful and brilliant park. The equipment is all ability inclusive. My 10 month old and 2 year old had a blast. So much for them to do and to climb on. Had a great time. The restrooms are closed for the winter but there is a portable potty there if you need it.

showerReviews.reviewText: I took a shower bought dinner and then was asked to leave because I was parked in the behind all the other trucks-totally out of the way not blocking any way out...  And my time had expired an hour before.  I will not be patronizing this ‚Ä¶

The staff here was friendly however the showers were downright nasty. If you don't have shower shoes you do not want to shower here. Ants on floor, spit across door. Just gross.  This is 100% the nastiest shower I have seen and we go cross ‚Ä¶

Showers been awesome here, clean, clean, clean. The shower, garbage laundry etc. Guy Greg. Really deserves all my tips. Im picky and this Pilot got the care employees here. Make sure u guys. See them showers and ull understand where im ‚Ä¶
The shower is nasty and no hot food at all

Husband & I stopped for a shower... a few hours later he informed me he had forget his wedding ring. üòë I quickly called thinking no way someone will be honest and turn it in as its a quite flashy piece of jewelry. I WAS WRONG. They informed ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to run the whole place and an empty roller grill and no condiments. Drivers can't stop just wherever we want truckstops are supposed to be a place for us to get a shower and food and a safe place to sleep this store is none of those

Me and my hubby stopped in here fueled up, and parked. Went inside to shower and was told no showers.. apparently no workers showed up but one. She said she couldn‚Äôt clean them because she couldn‚Äôt be both in front and in back of store. I ‚Ä¶

WED13DEC/23 I was at this pilot around 4.34 am in morning to get shower, zero shower was available when I asked this 2 employees were busy talking and gossiping with each other, after I used washroom came back to cash ou coffe this lady ‚Ä¶
Can‚Äôt complain, plenty parking was at 7pm free ones, clean shower. Standard pilot food and coffee. All employees was really nice, good service.
Nice place to layover shower and watch the NBA Finals.

locations.title: Acorn Valley Campground
locations.content: Acorn Valley Campground may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Acorn valley was a  great camp ground. Nice level pad. Clean shower house. Quite, great fire ring, friendly host. Highly recommend. Will visit again.

Nice place, booked last minute only $24.  Electric hookup, nice bathroom/shower house.  Some Parking spots are nestled into the woods and flat.
Did the reservation online.

Very clean bathrooms and shower house.  Well maintained grounds and paved roads and parking (better than gravel).  Inexpensive.  Camp hosts are friendly.  I've stayed long periods of time here and was comfortable.  Close to grocery stores ‚Ä¶
Nice campground with huge campsites.   Playground, fishing pond and hiking trails.  Clean restroom with shower.
Tent camping was in grassy areas 20-40 ft from parking. Great for groups. One shared shower house.  Near sailorville lake.
Very nice campground. Good price, quiet, and shady lots. Only 30 sites but all reservable. Clean shower house. *****

The place had pretty generous campsites with fire rings. My one complaint is the bathrooms need a serious remodel and could of least been cleaned , the shower was pretty yucky and just had to skip my showerüò∞ ‚Ä¶
Great place to camp, clean shower houses,restrooms, excellent staff taking care of the campground
Beautiful campground and exceptionally clean bathroom and shower

locations.title: Waukee Community Center
locations.street: 675 Walnut St "Good place for party of 50"
locations.content: Waukee Community Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: It is a great place for a gathering and for functions. The only downside is that it is kinda small and you have to clean up after yourself. Its location is in the heart of Waukee and you will be able to see the older part of Waukee.  In all it is a very good place for a group.

It is a great space for our Scout meetings! We have also used the facility for parties, as well! Nice, clean and comfortable building. There is a large room (with a kitchen) and a smaller room that can be used, separately - or jointly. The City of Waukee Parks and Rec are fantastic to work, with!

Excellent place. Clean, open, plenty of seating, clean restrooms.  Sink, full sized fridge and coffeemaker. Additional separate smaller meeting room. Unsure of the technology available as We didn't use any.
Very nice little room in downtown Waukee. Tables, bathrooms, coat hanging space, ovens and freezer, refrigerator space. Always very clean. Good for medium sized gatherings.
I've DJed here quite a few times and it always is the same. Very nice and modern building with bathrooms readily available. Very spacious and would have no problem fitting 50-60 people.
We had a small group (~25) that used this facility. It was clean and comfortable. I'm not the one who rented it, so I don't know about the cost. But it was perfect for our group.
Very nice facility, clean and spacious.
